attributes.action: Remove All Statues if Fascists and Slave Traders
attributes.additional_details: It’s as if we glorify Fascism, Racism, Homophobia etc. This is NOT okay, we demand an equal Britain. Just because one person did one thing for a good reason, does not mean they aren’t a bad person. These statues are still of Fascists and Slave Traders, they must be removed.
attributes.background: I would like the government to remove all statues of Fascists and Slave Traders, to promote an equal British Society. Too many former Slave Traders still stand proud which is disrespectful and disgusting in this modern day, action should be taken.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Encourage and support the removal of memorials that glorify the slave trade: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325449

Create an advisory board to review public statues and decide on their removal: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325673
